meanings.definition: To remove or detach from a mounting or support.
meanings.sent1: I need to unmount the picture frame from the wall.
meanings.sent2: Please unmount the TV from the bracket carefully.
meanings.sent3: Trying to unmount the stubborn screw from the wall was like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: She unmounted herself from the uncomfortable situation gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut had to unmount himself from the spaceship before floating in space.

meanings.definition: To remove a storage device from a computer system.
meanings.sent1: Remember to unmount the USB drive safely before pulling it out.
meanings.sent2: It is important to unmount external hard drives properly to avoid data loss.
meanings.sent3: The computer got confused when I tried to unmount the printer instead of the flash drive.
meanings.sent4: She unmounted the SD card from her phone, disconnecting memories in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The technician had to unmount the faulty hard drive to replace it with a new one.
